short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes the internet a little more bearable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replaces the full name of Canadian psychologist and internet darling Jordan Peterson with one of a number of amusing diminutives. This extension is a parody.

Forked from Steven Frank's "Cloud to Butt" extension.
